entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
